tutorial.title: Future Value of an Annuity
tutorial.scenario:
Ellen is 35 years old, and she has decided it is time to plan seriously for her retirement. At the end of each year until she is 65 years old she will save $10,000 in a retirement account. If the account earns 10% per year, how much will Ellen have saved at age 65?

Play
tutorial.step: Press the RESET button to clear all the previous entries.
Enter the number of periods (in this case 30), and then press the N button.
Enter the periodic interest rate (in this case 10), and then press the I/Y button.
Enter the annuity amount per period (in this case 10000), and then press the PMT button.
Press the CPT button and then the FV button to solve for the future value of the annuity.
